name: The Search for The Golden Crown Plant
name_original: The Search for The Golden Crown Plant
description:
A simple little gardening game I (Dave) made for Ludum Dare 52 with my 7 year old kid. He came up with the idea and did the art and I put it together.

Grow plants to eat or sell. Cross pollinate them to find new seeds. Discover the golden crown plant if you can... but watch out for the stinky turdmelon!

INSTRUCTIONS
  • Arrow Keys or Left Stick to move.
  • Spacebar or 'A' to interact.
  • Buy and plant seeds, then eat or sell the fruit at the truck.
  • The bee will pollinate plants in the order of fruiting, giving you different seeds when eaten!
